Changed ClasspathChange#generateDelta(...) to return false if the project no longer exists.
Added regression test JavaElementDeltaTest#testDeleteProjectAfterChangingClasspath().
Released for 3.3 M1 in HEAD.
*** Bug 148261 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
Verified for 3.3 M1 using build I20060807-0010.
